EmailTemplate.name: RE: PSA Agreement (1320354472.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: PSA Agreement (1320354472.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FW: PSA Agreement 1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Gary,
Thank you for forwarding this to me. I will review it and then we can have a conversation about specifically you would like to be included in the contract. Usually a termination clause does the trick but if you have more specific language in mind we can work on it and incorporate it. It may take me until Monday to fully review and get the approved changes back to BAE but I will do my best to get it done tomorrow if possible.
Thank you again and I look forward to speaking to you again soon.
Have a great evening,
Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Gary Pond [mailto:gpond59@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, November 03, 2011 12:02 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: FW: PSA Agreement
Nicolette,
Here is the draft contract. I filled in the requested fields and sent it to BAE as well. What is not included is some escape clause language...is that something you can help me with?
Gary ------ Forwarded Message From: Gary Pond <gpond59@gmail.com> Date: Thu, 03 Nov 2011 10:59:32 -0500 To: "Pachulski, Don (US SSA)" <donald.pachulski@baesystems.com> Conversation: PSA Agreement Subject: Re: PSA Agreement
Don,
As I mentioned earlier, MBO Partners will manage my contract. Nicolette, with MBO will contact you concerning contract ratification. I’ve filled out the yellow portions of the contract as requested. The portions of the Sow that I will be responsible for are: 1b, 1e, 1 F, 1G, and 1H. The labor category is ICBM Systems Subject Matter Expert. My fully burdened rate is $150/hr.
Thank You
Gary
On 10/27/11 11:12 AM, "Pachulski, Don (US SSA)" <donald.pachulski@baesystems.com> wrote: Gentleman, Attached please find the standard BAE Systems PSA Agreement and the relevant attachment including a generic SOW for the work that will need to be performed under this contract.
At this time we are requesting that you review and fill in the yellow highlighted portions of the documents, then sign and return the documents to me. In terms of pricing we are looking for a fixed priced labor hour fully burdened rate for the portions of the SOW that you feel your company can perform. Please state the labor category of the person, i.e. Sr Engineer, Fully burdened rate of $110/hr and the section(s) of the SOW that your company can perform.
Please review these documents and have your responses back to me by 11/2/11, if you have any questions or concerns please feel free to give me or Randy a call.
Regards, Don Don Pachulski, C.P.M. Sr. Subcontracts Manager
BAE Systems Technology Solutions & Services, Inc 5895 Core Rd North Charleston, SC 29406
(843) 614-5284 (478) 320-8694 Cell donald.pachulski@baesystems.com <mailto:donald.pachulski@baesystems.com>
